dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Get information about a class and its structure
dependencies.name: perl-class-inspector

dependencies.description: Simple, compact and correct param-checking functions
dependencies.name: perl-params-util

dependencies.description: Ensure that a platform has weaken support
dependencies.name: perl-task-weaken

dependencies.description: Make sure you didn't emit any warnings while testing
dependencies.name: perl-test-nowarnings

dependencies.description: Thoroughly testing objects via registered handlers
dependencies.name: perl-test-object

dependencies.description: Track the number of times subs are called
dependencies.name: perl-test-subcalls

dependent_to.description: Critique Perl source code for best-practices.
dependent_to.name: perl-perl-critic

dependent_to.description: Parse Perl string literals and string-literal-like things.
dependent_to.name: perl-ppix-quotelike

description: Parse, Analyze and Manipulate Perl (without perl)
name: perl-ppi

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
